solution_line_template: There are {kindergartners}+{first_graders} = <<{kindergartners}+{first_graders}={total_k_and_fg}>>{total_k_and_fg} kindergartners and first graders in Ms. Watson’s class.
There are {total_students}-{total_k_and_fg} = <<{total_students}-{total_k_and_fg}={second_graders}>>{second_graders} second graders in Ms. Watson’s class.
